content.about: Sacramento Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Sacramento area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jessica D.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Karen R.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Sacramento Antique Appraisals delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Jessica J.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Sacramento Antique Appraisals delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Sacramento provides professional antique appraisal services in the Sacramento area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Jessica C.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: Sarah D.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Jessica D.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Linda B.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and they delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.
